text: Ui! How are you? What are your thoughts on donation?
I like to give to good causes
Me too! What causes do you like to give to?
a variety, but mainly disaster relief

Would you consider donating part of your income from this task to save the children? They help to ensure kid's rights to health, education, and safety.  The war in Syria has really left a lot of little kids struggling
maybe, who runs this charity?
It's an international non governmental organization. They are a pretty solid organization that help support children in developing countries.
How long have they been around?
It was established in the UK in 1919, they have a good long track record!
sounds good, are you a contributor?
Absolutely! I give to this charity and environmental charities, but this is one of my favorites. One small donation really make a huge difference in a kids life!
do have a donation amount in mind for me
How about your salary from this task? 50 cents? That can provide a meal for a kid
I can do that
That is wonderful! You are a good egg.
you do your part as well
I will! 50 cents isnt much to me, but it can feed  kiddo for a day
agreed, I can spare 50 cents for this
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment (50 cents)
50 cents is fine
